Author: BENNETT

Notes: (often with the crest of the town of Taumarunui on it); cf Taranaki spanner. 33 [?dateline] Some soft sheilas start huntin' round for a King Country spanner but usin' a bottle opener has always struck me as a sure sign of a joker who probably uses a deodorant or votes Labour. ... ?? Ponga and Hangi now roll off my tongue and my son has taught me that a `King Country spanner' is a bottle of gin in the back seat.
Riki Tatahunga, better known as `King Dick', died recently at Tauranga. Also given as TrNZi 35/1904
